texts: Water is a very precious friend to all of us.
Trees, flowers, and our bodies all need water.
But in some places, it is not easy to find water.
That is why friends in Timor-Leste work together to get water.
Sometimes, people in the village gather at a big well to draw water together.
That is why every drop of water is truly precious.
We should save water when we brush our teeth or wash our hands.
Don’t forget to turn off the faucet.
Let’s think about how to save and reuse clean water.
Clean water keeps us healthy and strong.
Let’s all save water and protect it together.
Then our world will always be moist and full of life.
